meanings.definition: The state or quality of being hologynies.
meanings.sent1: The hologynies of the family were evident in their shared traditions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the hologynies of the species to understand their evolutionary history.
meanings.sent3: At the reunion, the hologynies of the relatives led to many stories being shared.
meanings.sent4: The hologynies of the community intertwined like threads in a tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The hologynies of the forest created a beautiful ecosystem.

meanings.definition: A group of organisms that have a common female ancestor.
meanings.sent1: The hologynies of the birds traced back to a single matriarch.
meanings.sent2: The hologynies of the herd showed strong maternal connections.
meanings.sent3: The hologynies of the insects made for an interesting study in genetics.
meanings.sent4: The hologynies of the pack were like branches of a family tree.
